markdown: ITC Limited REPORT AND ACCOUNTS 2013 <::logo: BINGO! BINGO! The word "BINGO!" is stylized with a playful, slightly tilted font, enclosed within a circular, glossy, 3D-like outline.::> <::A visual display of four Bingo! snack packets and loose snacks, tomatoes, and chilies. From left to right: 1. A packet of "BINGO! Mad Angles" with "Tomato Mischief" flavor, showing triangular chips and two whole tomatoes and one half tomato, along with some red chilies. 2. A packet of "BINGO! TEDHE MEDHE" with "Masala Tadka" flavor, showing twisted stick-like snacks and a bowl of spices, with loose twisted snacks in front. 3. A packet of "BINGO! Yumitos" with "International Cream & Onion" flavor, showing potato chips and onion rings, with loose potato chips, a dollop of cream, and a wedge of cheese in front. 4. A packet of "BINGO! TANGLES" with "Masala Tangle" flavor, showing square-shaped snacks, with loose square snacks and green chilies in front. All packets have the "BINGO!" logo prominently displayed.: figure::> Associated with youth, fun and excitement, Bingo! offers multiple variants of Potato Chips and Finger snacks to fulfil the consumer's need for variety and novelty with innovative formats and 'irresistible combinations' in flavours. CANDYMAN | mint-o <::A collection of candy products. From left to right, top to bottom: - A clear jar with a label that says "Fresh". - A small black pouch labeled "mint-o Fresh". - A clear jar labeled "mint-o GOL Mint Chew". - A clear jar labeled "mint-o GOL Orange Chew". - A small silver pouch labeled "mint-o GOL Mint Chew". - A small black pouch labeled "mint-o Fresh". - A black rectangular tin with text "ULTRA MINTS" and other smaller text. : product display::> <::A row of five different product packages, likely candy or snack bags, are displayed. From left to right: 1. **Package 1:** Features the brand "CANDYMAN" (partially visible) and product name "Cofitino". The image shows a cup filled with a creamy beverage or coffee. 2. **Package 2:** Displays the brand "CANDYMAN" (partially visible) and product name "FRUITEE FUN". A speech bubble reads "SURPRISE STICKER INSIDE". The package shows various fruits and candies. 3. **Package 3:** The central package, with the brand "CANDYMAN" (partially visible) and product name "Choce Double" (likely "Choco Double"). Text at the top says "SURPRISE TOY INSIDE". The image depicts chocolate pouring from a pot, surrounded by candies. 4. **Package 4:** Features the brand "CANDYMAN" (partially visible) and product name "Toffichoo". Small text indicates "COFFEE" flavor, and a banner at the bottom says "Strawberry". The package shows strawberry-flavored candies. 5. **Package 5:** The rightmost package, with the brand "CANDYMAN" (partially visible) and product name "NATKHA MANGO" (possibly "NATKHAT MANGO"). Text at the bottom reads "Kuch bhi karega for CANDYMAN" (partially visible). The image shows mangoes and candies. : figure::> <::Three product packages are displayed side-by-side. The leftmost package is labeled "Choco Double Eclairs" with "SURPRISE TOY INSIDE" at the top. It features an illustration of chocolate pouring into a cup, surrounded by candies. The middle package is labeled "CANDYMAN Toffichoo SOFT TOFFEE" with "Strawberry" flavor indicated on a banner at the bottom. It shows several pieces of toffee. The rightmost package is labeled "CANDYMAN NATKHAT MANGO" and features a cartoon illustration of a girl and a mango character. Below the illustration, the text "Kuch bhi karega for CANDYMAN" is visible. : product packages::> Candyman and mint-o offer a mouth-watering range of confectionery products in a variety of flavours and formats which delight consumers across age groups. Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/snbx0223

chunks.markdown: <::logo: BINGO! BINGO! The word "BINGO!" is stylized with a playful, slightly tilted font, enclosed within a circular, glossy, 3D-like outline.::>

<::A visual display of four Bingo! snack packets and loose snacks, tomatoes, and chilies. From left to right: 1. A packet of "BINGO! Mad Angles" with "Tomato Mischief" flavor, showing triangular chips and two whole tomatoes and one half tomato, along with some red chilies. 2. A packet of "BINGO! TEDHE MEDHE" with "Masala Tadka" flavor, showing twisted stick-like snacks and a bowl of spices, with loose twisted snacks in front. 3. A packet of "BINGO! Yumitos" with "International Cream & Onion" flavor, showing potato chips and onion rings, with loose potato chips, a dollop of cream, and a wedge of cheese in front. 4. A packet of "BINGO! TANGLES" with "Masala Tangle" flavor, showing square-shaped snacks, with loose square snacks and green chilies in front. All packets have the "BINGO!" logo prominently displayed.: figure::>

Associated with youth, fun and excitement, Bingo! offers multiple variants of Potato Chips and Finger snacks to fulfil the consumer's need for variety and novelty with innovative formats and 'irresistible combinations' in flavours.

<::A collection of candy products. From left to right, top to bottom: - A clear jar with a label that says "Fresh". - A small black pouch labeled "mint-o Fresh". - A clear jar labeled "mint-o GOL Mint Chew". - A clear jar labeled "mint-o GOL Orange Chew". - A small silver pouch labeled "mint-o GOL Mint Chew". - A small black pouch labeled "mint-o Fresh". - A black rectangular tin with text "ULTRA MINTS" and other smaller text. : product display::>

<::A row of five different product packages, likely candy or snack bags, are displayed. From left to right: 1. **Package 1:** Features the brand "CANDYMAN" (partially visible) and product name "Cofitino". The image shows a cup filled with a creamy beverage or coffee. 2. **Package 2:** Displays the brand "CANDYMAN" (partially visible) and product name "FRUITEE FUN". A speech bubble reads "SURPRISE STICKER INSIDE". The package shows various fruits and candies. 3. **Package 3:** The central package, with the brand "CANDYMAN" (partially visible) and product name "Choce Double" (likely "Choco Double"). Text at the top says "SURPRISE TOY INSIDE". The image depicts chocolate pouring from a pot, surrounded by candies. 4. **Package 4:** Features the brand "CANDYMAN" (partially visible) and product name "Toffichoo". Small text indicates "COFFEE" flavor, and a banner at the bottom says "Strawberry". The package shows strawberry-flavored candies. 5. **Package 5:** The rightmost package, with the brand "CANDYMAN" (partially visible) and product name "NATKHA MANGO" (possibly "NATKHAT MANGO"). Text at the bottom reads "Kuch bhi karega for CANDYMAN" (partially visible). The image shows mangoes and candies. : figure::>

<::Three product packages are displayed side-by-side. The leftmost package is labeled "Choco Double Eclairs" with "SURPRISE TOY INSIDE" at the top. It features an illustration of chocolate pouring into a cup, surrounded by candies. The middle package is labeled "CANDYMAN Toffichoo SOFT TOFFEE" with "Strawberry" flavor indicated on a banner at the bottom. It shows several pieces of toffee. The rightmost package is labeled "CANDYMAN NATKHAT MANGO" and features a cartoon illustration of a girl and a mango character. Below the illustration, the text "Kuch bhi karega for CANDYMAN" is visible. : product packages::>
Candyman and mint-o offer a mouth-watering range of confectionery products in a variety of flavours and formats which delight consumers across age groups.
